item.description: Fuzzing libxml2 with AFL++ Before starting, build AFL++ LLVM mode and QEMU mode. I assume that the path to AFL++ is ~/AFLplusplus, change it in the commands if your installation path is different. Download the source of libxml2 with git clone https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/libxml2.git cd libxml2 Now confgure it disabling the sahred libraries ./autogen.sh ./configure --enable-shared=no If you want to enable the sanitizers, use the proper env var. In this tutorial we will enable ASan and UBSan.
